title: 02/11/21 DPS Hour 3 Alan Roach and Denny Hamlin
itunes:title: 02/11/21 DPS Hour 3 Alan Roach and Denny Hamlin
description:
Alan Roach tells Dan some his fond memory's with being the voice of the Super Bowl. Denny Hamlin talks to Dan about going golfing with Michael Jordan. Denny says he hears about his PJ's all the time due the the success of the commercial.
